alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:14AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan, northeastern Breathitt, west central Magoffin and east central Wolfe Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 713 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shockey, or 8 miles northeast of Jackson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mountain Valley, Burkhart, Wheel Rim and Burg around 720 AM EDT. Bays, Dale, Cutuno, Netty and Epson around 725 AM EDT. Cornelia, Puncheon, Seiltz, Rousseau and Hager around 730 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Eugene, Ova, Guage, Stella, Camp Lewis, Kernie, Foraker, Fritz, Gullett, Gifford, Hendricks, Lambric, Salyersville, Lakesville, Mason, Carver Station and Tiptop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
